RANK.DESCRIPTION: displays members rank in this server

STATS.DESCRIPTION: displays members stats in this server
STATS.USER_DESC: the user to get stats for
STATS.NAME: User Tag

TRACKING.DESCRIPTION: enable or disable tracking stats in the server
TRACKING.ENABLED: Configuration saved! Stats Tracking is now enabled
TRACKING.DISABLED: Configuration saved! Stats Tracking is now disabled

XP.SUB_MESSAGE_MESSAGE: message to display when a user levels up
XP.SUB_CHANNEL_CHANNEL: channel to display level up messages in
XP.NO_MATCH_CHANNEL: No channel found matching that name
XP.INVALID_MESSAGE: Invalid message. Please provide a message
XP.MESSAGE_SAVED: Configuration saved. Level up message updated!
XP.INVALID_CHANNEL: Invalid channel. Please provide a channel
XP.CHANNEL_SAVED: Configuration saved. Level up channel updated!
